name: oran-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 10 HP. Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 10 HP.
short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to recover 10 HP.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that restores 10 HP in battle.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that restores 10 HP in battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: When held by a POKéMON, it will be used in battle to restore 10 HP.
